rule.name: radix_tree_root.rnode
rule.description: Based on the last bit of the pointer that points to the next node in a radix tree, the pointer may either be directly dereferenceable or not.

rule.name: radix_tree_node.slots
rule.description: The usage of the "slots" array of a radix tree node depends on its height, given in member "height". Ignore it for now.
